## 1. Background

This companion file is for the Eating Disorder Examination (EDE), which is widely viewed as the “gold standard” measure of eating disorder psychopathology. It provides a measure of the range and severity of eating disorder features. It can also generate operational eating disorder diagnoses. It is used in most treatment studies and in many other investigations of eating disorder psychopathology. Normative values are available.

Reference 1: ["Diagnostic and statistical manual of mental disorders (5th edition)"] (https://psychiatry.org/psychiatrists/practice/dsm)


## 2. Scoresheet

In order to clean the data:

(1) Selects raw variables being used for the current measure

(2) Renames variables to be easily identified

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library (cgwtools)
library(scorekeeper)
MAXED_raw <- read.csv('MAXED_RA_raw.csv')
EDE_clean <- readxl::('EDE_cleans.xlsx')
cleaned_data <- scorekeep(MAXED_raw, EDE_clean)
cleaned_spsrq_data <- cleaned_data[[3]]
```
